item.title: Need help my barrage
item.dc:creator: @tj007razor tj007razor
item.description:
@tj007razor wrote:

are you sure he didn’t just click the wrong button…which is pretty hard to do considering they are on different interfaces. Also, just make sure you didn’t like rename teleother to ice barrage and forgot about it, cause that would be a pretty stupid mistake

Read full topic

item.title: Need help my barrage
item.dc:creator: @drask182 drask182
item.description:
@drask182 wrote:

is this rite?

if(spellID == 12891) // ice barrage (lvl 94 spell) { if(playerLevel[6] >= 94) { hitDiff = misc.random(35); startAnimation(1979); attackPlayersWithin(369, 40, 5); castOnPlayer.inCombat(); inCombat(); PkingDelay = 25; //stillgfx(369, castOnPlayer.absY, castOnPlayer.absX); //castOnPlayer.stillgfx(369, castOnPlayer.absY, castOnPlayer.absX); castOnPlayer.sendMessage("You have been frozen!"); sendMessage("You freeze the enemy!"); teleportToX = absX; teleportToY = absY; } else if(playerLevel[6] <= 93) { sendMessage("You need a magic level of 94 to cast this spell."); } }

if(magicID == 12891) {// Ice Barrage if (playerLevel[playerMagic] >= 94) { stillgfx(369, EnemyY2, EnemyX2); stillgfx(368, absY, absX); attackNPCSWithin(369,45,15); hitDiff = 0 + misc.random(45); teleportToX = absX; teleportToY = absY; server.npcHandler.npcs[npcIndex].Frozentimer = 60; addSkillXP((100*hitDiff), playerMagic); startAnimation(1979); } else { sendMessage("You do not have the right level to cast this spell."); } }

if(spellID == 12891) // ice barrage (lvl 94 spell) { if(playerLevel[6] >= 94) { hitDiff = misc.random(35); startAnimation(1979); attackPlayersWithin(369, 40, 5); castOnPlayer.uberentangle(); castOnPlayer.inCombat(); inCombat(); PkingDelay = 15; //stillgfx(369, castOnPlayer.absY, castOnPlayer.absX); //castOnPlayer.stillgfx(369, castOnPlayer.absY, castOnPlayer.absX); castOnPlayer.sendMessage("You have been frozen!"); sendMessage("You freeze the enemy!"); teleportToX = absX; teleportToY = absY; } else if(playerLevel[6] <= 93) { sendMessage("You need a magic level of 94 to cast this spell."); } }

that rite?

Read full topic

item.title: Need help my barrage
item.dc:creator: @tj007razor tj007razor
item.description:
@tj007razor wrote:

just go through your spells, and find spell id 12891 (thats ice barrage) and make sure its what u need it to be
